byline.original: By JULIA PRESTON, BINYAMIN APPELBAUM and TRIP GABRIEL

abstract: Check Point column on some key assertions made in latest round of debates among Republican presidential primary candidates.
snippet: Rick Perry made a misleading attack on Mitt Romney concerning illegal immigration, and analysts contested Herman Cain’s conclusion about his tax plan.
lead_paragraph: Rick Perry made a misleading attack on Mitt Romney concerning illegal immigration, and analysts contested Herman Cain’s conclusion about his tax plan.

headline.main: Romney’s Lawn Care History and the Fight Over Immigration
headline.print_headline: Romney’s Lawn Care and the Fight Over Immigration
headline.seo: Check Point: Illegal Immigration and Romney’s Lawn Care
